option.name: fileSummaryMaps
option.value: {"D:/Work/Programming/BostaAssessmentCompose":"{\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/ui/composables/CitySearchField.kt\":\"This file contains a single Composable function:\\n\\n`CitySearchField`: A composable function that creates an `OutlinedTextField` with a search icon, allowing the user to input a search query for a city or area.\\n\\nThe file is responsible for creating a reusable UI component for a city/area search field in a Compose-based Android application.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/common/di/RetrofitProvider.kt\":\"This file is a Dagger Hilt module that provides a Retrofit client for the `CityService` interface. It defines a singleton instance of the Retrofit client with the base URL set to `\\\"https://stg-app.bosta.co/api/v2/\\\"` and the Gson converter factory.\\n\\n`RetrofitProvider`: A Dagger Hilt module that provides a singleton instance of the `CityService` Retrofit client.\\n\\n`citiesRetrofitClient()`: A Dagger Hilt-provided function that returns a singleton instance of the `CityService` Retrofit client.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/ui/viewmodels/CitiesListViewModel.kt\":\"This file contains a single class and several functions:\\n\\n`CitiesListViewModel`: A ViewModel class that manages the state and logic for a cities list screen.\\n\\n`getCities()`: Fetches the list of cities from the `CityRepo` and updates the `citiesListState` with the loaded data.\\n\\n`toggleDistrictVisibility(city: City)`: Toggles the visibility of a city\\u0027s districts in the `citiesListState`.\\n\\n`onSearchQueryChanged(query: String)`: Updates the `searchQuery` in the `citiesListState` when the user changes the search query.\\n\\n`searchCities(text: String?)`: Filters the list of cities based on the search query and updates the `citiesListState` with the refined results.\\n\\nThis file is responsible for managing the state and logic of a cities list screen in an Android application. It uses a ViewModel to encapsulate the business logic and communicate with a repository to fetch the city data. The ViewModel also handles user interactions, such as toggling district visibility and searching for cities.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/data/mappers/IMapper.kt\":\"This file defines an interface called `IMapper` that provides a set of functions for mapping between a model and a data transfer object (DTO).\\n\\n`IMapper`: An interface that defines methods for mapping between a model and a DTO.\\n\\n`mapToModel`: A function that maps a DTO to a model.\\n`mapToDto`: A function that maps a model to a DTO.\\n`mapListToModel`: A function that maps a list of DTOs to a list of models.\\n`mapListToDto`: A function that maps a list of models to a list of DTOs.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/ui/theme/Type.kt\":\"This file defines the typography styles for a Jetpack Compose-based Android application. It sets the default text style for the `bodyLarge` component, and provides commented-out examples for other text styles such as `titleLarge` and `labelSmall`.\\n\\n`Typography`: Defines the set of Material typography styles to be used in the application.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/data/dtos/DistrictDTO.kt\":\"This file contains a single data class:\\n\\n`DistrictDTO`: A data class that represents a district, including its zone ID, zone name, district ID, district name, pickup and drop-off availability, and coverage.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It serves as a data transfer object (DTO) for representing district information in the application.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/ui/states/CitiesListScreenState.kt\":\"This file defines a data class `CitiesListScreenState` that represents the state of the cities list screen in the application.\\n\\n`CitiesListScreenState`: A data class that holds the state of the cities list screen, including loading status, the list of cities, a list of expanded cities, and a search query.\\n\\nThe file does not contain any functions. It serves as a data model for the state of the cities list screen in the application.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/common/ui/BaseViewModel.kt\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`BaseViewModel`: A marker class that extends `ViewModel` and serves as a base class for other ViewModels in the application.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It simply defines a base ViewModel class that can be used as a starting point for other ViewModels in the application.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/ui/theme/Color.kt\":\"This file defines a set of color constants for a Compose-based Android application. It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather a collection of color values that can be used throughout the application\\u0027s UI.\\n\\n`Purple80`: A dark purple color.\\n`PurpleGrey80`: A dark purple-gray color.\\n`Pink80`: A dark pink color.\\n`Purple40`: A lighter purple color.\\n`PurpleGrey40`: A lighter purple-gray color.\\n`Pink40`: A lighter pink color.\\n`LightGray`: A light gray color.\\n`BostaRed`: A red color used in the Bosta application.\\n`BostaGrey40`: A gray color used in the Bosta application.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/ui/screens/CitiesListScreen.kt\":\"This file contains a Compose-based UI for displaying a list of cities and their districts. It uses a ViewModel to manage the state of the screen and interact with the data layer.\\n\\n`CitiesListScreen`: Composable function that sets up the CitiesListScreenContent and handles the initial loading of the cities.\\n\\n`CitiesListScreenContent`: Composable function that displays the list of cities and their districts, with a search field and loading indicator.\\n\\n`CityItem`: Composable function that displays a single city item, with the ability to expand and show its districts.\\n\\n`DistrictItem`: Composable function that displays a single district item.\\n\\n`CitySearchField`: Composable function that displays a search field for filtering the list of cities.\",\"/settings.gradle.kts\":\"This file is a Gradle configuration file for an Android project. It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather defines the project\\u0027s build settings and dependencies. Here\\u0027s a summary of the different sections:\\n\\n`pluginManagement`: This section configures the repositories where Gradle plugins can be found, including the Google repository, Maven Central, and the Gradle Plugin Portal.\\n\\n`dependencyResolutionManagement`: This section configures the repositories where project dependencies can be found, including the Google repository and Maven Central. It also sets the `RepositoriesMode` to `FAIL_ON_PROJECT_REPOS`, which means that the build will fail if any project-specific repositories are defined.\\n\\n`rootProject.name`: This sets the name of the root project to \\\"Bosta Assessment Compose\\\".\\n\\n`include(\\\":app\\\")`: This includes the \\\":app\\\" module in the project.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/MainActivity.kt\":\"This file is the main entry point for the Bosta Assessment Compose application. It sets up the Compose UI and initializes the `CitiesListScreen` which displays a list of cities.\\n\\n`MainActivity`: The main activity of the application that sets up the Compose UI and initializes the `CitiesListScreen`.\\n\\n`onCreate`: Initializes the Compose UI and sets up the `CitiesListScreen` within a `Scaffold` component.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/common/network/CityService.kt\":\"This file defines an interface called `CityService` that provides a single function `getCities` which fetches a list of cities from a remote API endpoint.\\n\\n`CityService`: An interface that defines the API endpoint and parameters for fetching a list of cities.\\n\\n`getCities`: A suspend function that takes a `countryId` parameter and returns a `ListResponse\\u003cCityDTO\\u003e` containing a list of city data transfer objects.\",\"/app/build.gradle.kts\":\"This file is a Gradle build script for an Android application. It sets up the project configuration, including the Android SDK version, dependencies, and build types. It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather configures the build process for the Android application.\\n\\nThe key elements in this file are:\\n\\n`plugins`: Specifies the Android application plugin, Kotlin Android plugin, and Kotlin Compose plugin to be used in the project.\\n`android`: Configures the Android-specific settings, such as the namespace, compile SDK version, default app settings, and build types.\\n`dependencies`: Declares the external libraries and frameworks used in the project, including Android Core KTX, Lifecycle, Compose, Retrofit, Gson, Dagger Hilt, and others.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/data/repo/CityRepo.kt\":\"This file contains a single class and one function:\\n\\n`CityRepo`: A repository class that fetches a list of cities from a city service and maps the response data to a list of `City` models.\\n\\n`getCities`: A function that retrieves a list of cities for a given country ID from the city service, maps the response data to a list of `City` models, and returns the mapped list.\\n\\nThe purpose of this file is to provide a repository layer that encapsulates the logic for fetching and mapping city data from a remote service. This repository can be used by higher-level components in the application to access city data.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/data/mappers/DistrictMapper.kt\":\"This file contains the following classes and functions:\\n\\n`DistrictMapper`: A class that maps a `DistrictDTO` object to a `District` object.\\n\\n`mapToModel`: A function that maps a `DistrictDTO` object to a `District` object.\\n\\n`mapToDto`: A function that maps a `District` object to a `DistrictDTO` object (not yet implemented).\\n\\nThis file is responsible for mapping data transfer objects (DTOs) to domain models and vice versa, specifically for the `District` entity in the context of a cities list application.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/common/network/ListResponse.kt\":\"This file defines a data class `ListResponse` which is used to represent a response from a network request that returns a list of data.\\n\\n`ListResponse\\u003cT\\u003e`: A data class that represents a network response containing a success status, a message, and a list of data of type `T`.\\n\\nThe file does not contain any functions, only the definition of the `ListResponse` data class.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/data/mappers/CityMapper.kt\":\"This file contains a single class and two functions:\\n\\n`CityMapper`: A class that maps between `City` model and `CityDTO` data transfer object.\\n\\n`mapToModel`: A function that maps a `CityDTO` object to a `City` model.\\n`mapToDto`: A function that maps a `City` model to a `CityDTO` object (not yet implemented).\\n\\nThis file is responsible for mapping between the `City` model and the `CityDTO` data transfer object, which is likely used for data transfer between different layers of the application.\",\"/app/src/androidTest/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/ExampleInstrumentedTest.kt\":\"This file contains an instrumented test for an Android app. It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather a single test case that checks if the app\\u0027s package name matches the expected value.\\n\\n`ExampleInstrumentedTest`: This is an instrumented test class that runs on an Android device and checks the context of the app under test.\\n\\n`useAppContext()`: This test function checks if the package name of the app under test matches the expected value.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/ui/composables/DistrictItem.kt\":\"This file contains a single Composable function and a Preview function for it.\\n\\n`DistrictItem`: A Composable function that displays a single District item in a list.\\n\\n`DistrictItemPreview`: A Preview function that displays the `DistrictItem` Composable with a mock District data.\\n\\nThis file is responsible for defining the UI component for displaying a single District item in a list, which can be used in the larger Cities List feature of the Bosta Assessment app.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/ui/theme/Theme.kt\":\"This file defines the theme for the Bosta Assessment Compose application. It includes the following:\\n\\n`DarkColorScheme`: A private color scheme for the dark theme.\\n\\n`LightColorScheme`: A private color scheme for the light theme.\\n\\n`BostaAssessmentComposeTheme`: A composable function that sets the theme for the application based on the system\\u0027s dark mode setting and the availability of dynamic colors on Android 12+.\\n\\nThe file sets up the color schemes and typography for the Bosta Assessment Compose application, allowing it to adapt to the user\\u0027s system theme and device capabilities.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/data/dtos/CityDTO.kt\":\"This file contains a single data class:\\n\\n`CityDTO`: A data class that represents a city, including its ID, name, other name, code, associated districts, and availability for pickup and drop-off.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It serves as a data transfer object (DTO) for representing city-related information in the application.\",\"/build.gradle.kts\":\"This file is a top-level build file that sets up common configuration options for all sub-projects or modules in the Android application. It does not contain any classes or functions, but instead, it sets up the following plugins:\\n\\n`alias(libs.plugins.android.application) apply false`: Applies the Android application plugin.\\n`alias(libs.plugins.kotlin.android) apply false`: Applies the Kotlin Android plugin.\\n`alias(libs.plugins.kotlin.compose) apply false`: Applies the Kotlin Compose plugin.\\n`id(\\\"com.google.dagger.hilt.android\\\") version \\\"2.56.1\\\" apply false`: Applies the Dagger Hilt Android plugin.\\n\\nThe purpose of this file is to centralize the configuration of these common plugins, making it easier to manage and apply them across all sub-projects or modules in the Android application.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/ui/composables/CityItem.kt\":\"This file contains a single Composable function:\\n\\n`CityItem`: A Composable function that displays a city item with an optional expanded view showing the city\\u0027s districts.\\n\\nThe file is responsible for rendering a UI component that represents a city item in a list. It includes a clickable row that displays the city name and an icon to indicate whether the item is expanded or not. When the item is expanded, it displays a list of the city\\u0027s districts using a `LazyColumn`.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/data/models/District.kt\":\"This file contains a single data class:\\n\\n`District`: A data class that represents a district, containing information such as the zone ID, zone name, district ID, district name, pickup and drop-off availability, and coverage.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It serves as a data model for representing district information in the application.\",\"/app/src/test/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/ExampleUnitTest.kt\":\"This file contains a single unit test class with one test function. The file does not define any classes or functions, but rather contains a single unit test that verifies the correctness of the addition operation.\\n\\n`ExampleUnitTest`: A class that contains a single unit test for the addition operation.\\n\\n`addition_isCorrect()`: A test function that verifies that the addition operation of 2 + 2 is correct and returns the expected result of 4.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/cities_list/data/models/City.kt\":\"This file defines a data class `City` and its companion object, which contains mock data for cities and their districts.\\n\\n`City`: A data class that represents a city, including its ID, name, other name, code, list of districts, and availability for pickup and drop-off.\\n\\n`City.mock1`: A mock instance of the `City` class representing the city of Alexandria.\\n\\n`City.mock2`: A mock instance of the `City` class representing the city of Assuit.\\n\\n`City.mockList`: A list of the two mock city instances.\\n\\nThis file serves as a data model for cities and their districts, providing mock data for testing or initialization purposes.\",\"/app/src/main/java/com/peter/bosta_assessment/MainApplication.kt\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`MainApplication`: This class is the main application class for the Android app, and it is annotated with the `@HiltAndroidApp` annotation, which is used to enable Dagger Hilt for dependency injection in the app.\\n\\nThe file does not contain any functions, but it serves as the entry point for the Android app and sets up the necessary infrastructure for the app to use Dagger Hilt for dependency injection.\"}"}
